text:
Ivonne Cerdas Cascante (born 1993 in San José, Costa Rica) is a Costa Rican model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Costa Rica 2020.
Personal life.
Cerdas was born in San José, Costa Rica. She works as a model and she is a software engineer who graduated from National Technical University in Barrio Lourdes, Alajuela Province.
Miss Costa Rica 2012.
Cerdas finished as the 1st Runner-Up at Miss Costa Rica 2012. Meanwhile, the official winner was Nazareth Cascante crowned as 2012 winner and competed at Miss Universe 2012 in Las Vegas, U.S..
Miss Costa Rica 2015.
Cerdas finished as the 2nd Runner-Up at Miss Costa Rica 2015. Meanwhile, the official winner was Brenda Castro crowned as the 2015 winner and competed at Miss Universe 2015 in Las Vegas, U.S..
Miss Costa Rica 2020.
On November 18, 2020, Cerdas was crowned as Miss Costa Rica 2020 on her third attempt. She succeeded outgoing Miss Costa Rica 2019 Paola Chacón.
Miss Universe 2020.
Cerdas represented Costa Rica at Miss Universe 2020.
